text: Baaz yahud kalmaat ko unn ki theek jagah say hair pher ker detay hain aur kehtay hain kay hum ney suna aur na farmani ki aur sunn iss kay baghair kay tu suna jaye aur humari riyayat ker! (lekin iss kay kehney mein) apni zaban ko paich detay hain aur deen mein taana detay hain aur agar yeh log kehtay kay hum ney suna aur hum ney farmanbardari ki aur aap suniye aur humen dekhiye to yeh inn kay liye boht behtar aur nihayat hi munasib tha lekin Allah Taalaa ney inn kay kufur ki waja say enhen laanat ki hai. Pus yeh boht hi kum eman latay hain
